description.zh-cn: 中国材料力学领域专家，中国科学院院士，美国国家工程院外籍院士。曾任北京大学工学院教授，现任北京理工大学副校长。
description.en: A Chinese expert in materials mechanics, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and a foreign member of the US National Academy of Engineering. He was a professor at the College of Engineering of Peking University and currently serves as the Vice President of Beijing Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 一门研究材料在各种外力作用下产生的应变和应力，以及刚度和强度的学科。
description.en: A discipline that studies the strain and stress generated in materials under various external forces, as well as their stiffness and strength.

zh-cn: 深圳-北理工-莫斯科大学

description.zh-cn: 指在获得博士学位后，于高等院校或研究机构中进行限期性研究工作的人员职位。
description.en: Refers to a position for individuals who conduct limited-term research at a university or research institute after obtaining a doctoral degree.

description.zh-cn: 指2022年10月9日方岱宁在线上学术会议期间被一名女性亲吻，引发网络关注和官方调查的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident on October 9, 2022, where Fang Daining was kissed by a woman during an online academic conference, which attracted online attention and an official investigation.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁出生于江西南昌。
description.en: Fang Daining was born in Nanchang, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于1982年和1986年分别获得南京工业大学的学士和硕士学位。
description.en: Fang Daining obtained his bachelor's and master's degrees from Nanjing Tech University in 1982 and 1986, respectively.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于1989至1993年在以色列理工学院航空航天系学习，并获得博士学位。
description.en: Fang Daining studied at the Department of Aerospace Engineering at the Technion – Israel Institute of Technology from 1989 to 1993 and obtained his PhD.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于1993至1994年在以色列特拉维夫大学力学与材料结构系从事博士后研究。
description.en: Fang Daining was a postdoctoral fellow at the Department of Mechanics, Materials, and Structures at Tel Aviv University from 1993 to 1994.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于1994至1995年在美国马里兰大学机械工程系担任研究助理。
description.en: Fang Daining worked as a research assistant at the Department of Mechanical Engineering at the University of Maryland from 1994 to 1995.

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于1995至2009年在清华大学工程力学系任职，先后担任副教授、教授。
description.en: Fang Daining worked at the Department of Engineering Mechanics at Tsinghua University from 1995 to 2009, serving as an associate professor and then professor.

position.zh-cn: 讲席教授、工学院副院长
position.en: Chair Professor, Vice Dean of the College of Engineering

description.zh-cn: 方岱宁于2009至2015年在北京大学任职，担任讲席教授和工学院副院长。
description.en: Fang Daining worked at Peking University from 2009 to 2015, serving as a Chair Professor and Vice Dean of the College of Engineering.

position.zh-cn: 教授、副校长、校学术委员会主任
position.en: Professor, Vice President, Director of the Academic Committee

description.zh-cn: 北京理工大学于2022年10月10日就“亲吻门”事件发表情况说明，称学校已经启动调查工作，并于同年12月7日公布处理结果。
description.en: On October 10, 2022, Beijing Institute of Technology issued a statement regarding the 'Kissing Gate' incident, announcing that the university had initiated an investigation, and released the results on December 7 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 因“亲吻门”事件，中国科学院于2022年12月7日决定暂停方岱宁参加院士会议等学部组织的学术活动、推荐和选举院士以及外籍院士、选举和被选举成为学部常设领导机构成员的权利。
description.en: Due to the 'Kissing Gate' incident, the Chinese Academy of Sciences decided on December 7, 2022, to suspend Fang Daining's rights to participate in academic activities organized by the academy such as academician conferences, to recommend and elect academicians and foreign academicians, and to elect and be elected as a member of the standing leadership of the academic divisions.
